title: Over $4800 spent.

replies.body:
God damn, that's like 3/4 of a college tuition XD 

Also how did you buy 0.629999999997 worth of RP?
3/4 ? $11,000 is my One semester Fee I wish he would have given me something T_T
Only around $6000 for your first year here in Christchurch :D (depending on what you take of course)
Man can I Reversetime and come to Nz than Aus -.- I pay $11,000*6= 66,000 just in my BOB (Accounting){{item:3151}}

ahaha, I really didn't think I'd gotten so far ahead of myself when purchasing RP. 
And I really don't know how. x'D Maybe from a half completed phone transaction or something.

https://i.gyazo.com/295e246686aefaca3404cae5ae063ffe.png

This is the only account it works on.

I think I owned 60% of the content.

I have 3 other accounts that owned every skin, champ, rune, etc.

> [{quoted}](name=hðnkƒørÇªmíllè,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BgPQ5Izs,comment-id=00030000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-07T07:06:56.002+0000)
>
> Rip sackboy. well good to see ya anyways, been a while since last time I seen sacky

:^)

Sackboy is a legend that'll never be forgotten.
I thought I was bad :P Though admittedly most of my spendings were earlier on when I didn't have anything to save towards. I don't regret most of my RP purchases, some though certainly :P.

Honestly, you aren't given enough refund options, 3 is an incredibly small amount compared to how many skins/champs there actually is. 
I've gotten to the point where every week $50 goes on and get's spent on nothing but Hextech chests, and that isn't because I want Hextech Annie/Vayne or ward, I already own all three, it's because I just can't decide on what skin I actually want. 

Can't say I regret any of my purchases, every champion in league of legends is amazing, and has a wildly different play style, they're all amazing, 


...except Ivern, stupid dopey tree.

Ahaha, I wouldn't say no to more refunds, but I also don't think there's any real obligation there. If anything I'd say make it clearer you get 3 and three only, and make them not usable on IP purchases.

I don't have huge amounts of disposable income, especially now, so I regret buying skins for champions I don't really play. I love Lunar Goddess Diana but I don't play DIana.

Understandable. 
Just more refunds would be helpful for those purchases that were out of pure stupidity, like buying Imperial lux. lol
